definition: abbr. for Canada 加拿大[Jia1 na2 da4]/surname Jia

to add/plus/(used after an adverb such as 不, 大, 稍 etc, and before a disyllabic verb, to indicate that the action of the verb is applied to sth or sb previously mentioned)/to apply (restrictions etc) to (sb)/to give (support, consideration etc) to (sth)

sentences.english: Contemporary Calvinists may sometimes be responsible for perpetuating this image.
sentences.chinese: 當代的加爾文派也許要爲延續這種印象負責。

sentences.english: 1566 - Calvinists are granted rights in the Netherlands.
sentences.chinese: 1566年的今天，荷蘭承認加爾文教。

sentences.english: Calvinism was the most convenient religion since the days of the ancients.
sentences.chinese: 加爾文主義是自古以來最方便的宗教。

sentences.english: Calvinism isn't a religion of subservience to any government.
sentences.chinese: 加爾文教不爲政府服務。

sentences.english: Calvinist Christianity has a culture of phenomenal industry.
sentences.chinese: 基督教加爾文主義擁有矚目的產業文化。

sentences.english: Like the Pilgrims, they were also Calvinists.
sentences.chinese: 他們如同新教徒一樣是屬於加爾文教派。

sentences.english: He dispelled the myth that Calvinism was anti-evangelistic.
sentences.chinese: 他驅散了那種認爲加爾文主義反對傳福音的神話。

sentences.english: This is particularly true of the Calvinist tradition.
sentences.chinese: 尤其是這樣的加爾文主義的傳統。

sentences.english: But by parity of reasoning it falls upon Calvinism.
sentences.chinese: 但平價的推理，它落在加爾文。

sentences.english: Carwin was wanted in dublin for theft and murder .
sentences.chinese: 加爾文因偷盜和謀殺正受都柏林方面通輯。

sentences.english: How many Calvinists does it take to change a light bulb?
sentences.chinese: 更換一個燈泡要勞動多少個加爾文主義者？

sentences.english: I've read your stuff about the psychological realism of Calvin.
sentences.chinese: 我讀過你論加爾文心理唯實論的文章。

sentences.english: Calvin and Hodge take this view.
sentences.chinese: 加爾文與賀治都持著這看法。

sentences.english: Popery . For an account of the "Institutes" see CALVINISM.
sentences.chinese: 對於一個帳戶的“研究所”看到加爾文主義。

sentences.english: Too frequently this is the popular image of Calvinism.
sentences.chinese: 這往往是人們對加爾文主義的普遍印象。

sentences.english: I've read your stuff about the psychological realism of Calvin .
sentences.chinese: 我讀過你論加爾文心理唯實論的文章。
